retention_period_set_default_info:
This retention period will be set as the
default which affects the following:
retention_period_info_popover:
The retention period is an automated cycle 
that identifies the duration of time for how long 
personal data is maintained.
Once the retention period has reached its 
number of days, this will delete the personal 
data of all users in all locations in compliance 
with GDPR.
retention_period_default_info_popover: The retention period is the time cycle that determines the duration of storage of inactive data. After the expiration of the established storage period, the deactivated data will be deleted in accordance with the GDPR.
retention_period_add_note_text:
You can set the general retention period
affecting all users, locations and countries.
You are also able to manually set separate retention
periods for individual users, locations and countries
in the corresponding tabs when adding or editing retention periods.
only_data_belonging_to_the_user_role_wil: Only data belonging to the User role will be stored in the "Inactive User Data" section.
retention_period_add_manually_set_text:

items will override the General Retention Period.

if_you_logout_all_info_for_super_admin:

Translators, Users, Franchise Partners, Subscription
Partners and their Subscribers will be temporarily
denied access to the system until You come back and

if_you_logout_all_info_for_company_super:

and Users will be temporarily denied access to the system until you
come back and "Allow to Log In" again.
everyone_currently_using_the_system_exce:

Super Admin, will be instantly logged out and will
be temporarily denied access to the system until

Data Protection by

Data Protection by Design

gdpr_according_to_art_15:
According to Art. 15 GDPR you have the right to obtain confirmation from Willing & Able
(controller) as to whether or not personal data concerning you are being processed, and,
where Willing & Able processes personal data, access to the personal data. We process the
following personal data about you.
all_personal_data_and_the_information_me:
All personal data and the information mentioned within Art. 15 GDPR
can be downloaded by clicking the Download button.
gdpr_according_to_art_16:
According to Art. 16 GDPR you have the right to obtain from Willing & Able (controller)
without undue delay the rectification of inaccurate personal data. You have further the
right to have incomplete personal data completed, including by means of providing
a supplementary statement. In the following form, you can rectify inaccurate data,
complete any incomplete data, and add a supplementary statement to every data field.
gdpr_according_to_art_20:
In this section you can download a PDF file that contains all personal data that we process
about you. Furthermore, our system allows you to send this PDF file, encrypted and password
protected and incorporated in a ZIP file, directly to another controller. 
To send your personal data to another controller, you need to enter a password and 
the e-mail address of the other controller. Please, choose your preferred option.
please_save_the_password_and_share_it_wi:
Please, save the password and share it with the other controller. Without the password, 
the other controller will not be able to open the ZIP file.
gdpr_article_17_description_message:
You are about to delete your account permanently.
If proceeded, you will lose access to the application.
Your account cannot be restored.
Are you sure that you want to delete your account?
gdpr_article_18_description_message:
You are about to restrict your account. If proceeded, you will lose access to the functionality of the application.
However, you can restore your account at any time.
Are you sure that you want to restrict your account?
gdpr_article_21_description_message:
You are about to object to the processing of your personal data. If proceeded,
you will lose access to the functionality of the application.
Are you sure that you want to object to processing?
gdpr_article_22_description_message:
This application does not allow automated 
decision-making or profiling.
gdpr_article_24_description_message:
Willing & Able has implemented a framework of guidelines,
policies, and measures to ensure that its use of personal data is safe,
proportionate, and lawful, and in accordance with the
General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Willing & Able protects the
confidentiality and ensures the security of all processed information.
Access to such information is limited, and internal policies and
appropriate technical and organisational measures are
implemented to safeguard the processing of personal data. Technical
measures include actions to address security, risk of data loss, alteration
or unauthorised access, taking into consideration the risk presented
by processing and of the personal data being processed. Organisational
measures include policies about access restrictions, backups,
and archiving. More information about our measures are mentioned
in the following document.
gdpr_article_25_description_message:
Willing & Able has implemented many features to comply
with Data Protection by Design rules, for example, this section.
Data Protection by Default can be reviewed by checking our
standard settings. If you have any questions in
relation to Data Protection by Design or Data Protection by
Default, please contact our Data Protection Officer.
gdpr_article_26_description_message:
Willing & Able acts jointly with some of its
Subscription Partners or Franchise Partners. The essence of
the arrangements between Willing and Able and its joint
controllers was made available to the data subject within the

I am informed that the withdrawal of consent shall not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal. By my click, I declare as well that I have read the
with_my_click_on_accept_I_freely_give_co: With my click on "Accept", I freely give consent to the application provider to process my personal data to provide an account, services and software applications. I am aware that I have the right to withdraw my consent at any time with effect for the future, for example, by the functionality provided within the privacy section of the application. downgrading_subscription: You are downgrading your subscription. The activation will be available after your current subscription will over

login_system: Fill out your Company details to log in to the system!
if_you_recently_signed_up_for_a_differen: If You recently signed up for a different subscription plan. This means once You confirm below, You will receive your new subscription plan benefits immediately.
if_you_want_to_change_your_current_plan: If You want to change your current plan, please refer to the agreement terms from your current plan.
after_downgrading_your_subscription_plan:
After downgrading your subscription plan, You will
continue to pay the amount of the current
subscription plan until the expiry date of your current
contractual period.
after_upgrading_your_subscription_plan:
After upgrading your subscription plan, You will pay the difference between your old and upgraded
subscription plan until the expiry date of your current contractual period.
if_you_do_not_cancel_your_subscription_p:
If You do not cancel your subscription plan before its expiry date, new annual contract will be automatically
created with the upgraded subscription plan, for which You will be required to pay the full amount.

If You do not cancel your subscription plan before its expiry date, new annual contract will be
automatically created with the downgraded subscription plan, for which You will be required to
pay the new amount.

questions_count_cant_be_greater_than_exi: Questions count can't be greater than existing active exam questions.
the_email_is_already_in_use: The e-mail is already in use
welcome_message_admin: Welcome to the Online Training System of DGD Deutsche Gesellschaft für Datenschutz GmbH
domain_was_not_connected:
Domain was not connected. Please try again with the same
connection method or choose the other one. Make sure you
follow all the instructions correctly. Contact us for more help.
please_allow_up_to_24_hours_for_the_doma:
Please, allow up to 24 hours for the domain to be connected.
The system will notify You about the state of the request within
the next 24 hours.
choose_only_one_of_the_methods_to_connec:
Choose only one of the methods to connect your domain.
 Note that it may take up to 24 hours for the domain to be connected after the request is sent.
follow_the_instructions_to_connect_your_:
Follow the instructions to connect your own domain by adding
an A Record to your DNS (Domain Name System).
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_step_: Open a new tab/window, and sign in with the host of the domain You want to attach.
Access the DNS management page in the domain settings.
Choose the desired root domain or subdomain (or add a new subdomain) and create a new record of the type A Record.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_by_ad: Choose the desired subdomain (or add a new subdomain) and create a new record of the type CNAME Record.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_step_:
Depending on the domain provider, there are several ways to add an
A record, please check the instructions from your domain host provider.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_by_ad:
Depending on the domain provider, there are several ways to
add a CNAME record, please check the instructions from your
domain host provider.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_step_: Point the A Record to the IP address: :ABLE_TO_TRAIN_IP_ADDRESS.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_by_ad: Point the CNAME Record to the page name: :DOMAIN NAME.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_step_: Update the DNS records table to check that the changes are reflected.

When You see the A Record added to the DNS records table, return
to this page and click the "Submit and Connect" button below.
Please note that depending on the host of your domain, it may take
a while for the DNS records to be updated.
instructions_to_connect_own_domain_by_ad:
When You see the CNAME Record added to the DNS records table, return to
this page and click the "Submit and Connect" button below. Please note that
depending on the host of your domain, it may take a while for the DNS records to be updated.
i_have_already_followed_the_instructions: I have already followed the instructions above.
follow_the_instructions_to_connect_your_:
Follow the instructions to connect your own domain by adding
a CNAME Record to your DNS (Domain Name System).
follow_the_instructions_to_verify_your_d:
Follow the instructions to verify your domain ownership by
adding a TXT Record to your DNS (Domain Name System).

Follow the instructions to verify your domain ownership by
uploading an HTML file to the root directory of your website.

Follow the instructions to verify your domain ownership by
adding a meta tag to the homepage of your domain.
copy_the_TXT_record_from_here: Copy the TXT record from here.
add_trusted_domain_steps_2: Open a new tab/window, and sign in with the host of the domain You want to attach.
add_trusted_domain_steps_3:
Access the DNS management page in the domain settings of the
domain You want to attach.
add_trusted_domain_steps_4: Add your copied TXT record in the text value field of the DNS records.
add_trusted_domain_steps_5:
When updated, You shall see the TXT record added to the DNS
records table.
add_trusted_domain_steps_6:
When You see the TXT Record added to the DNS records table, 
return to this page and click the "Submit and Verify" button below.
Please note that depending on the host of your domain, it may take a while
for the DNS records to be updated.
make_sure_you_have_admin_access_to_the_r: Make sure you have admin access to the root folder of your website.
add_trusted_domain_by_HTML_file_steps_2:
Download the HTML file. Do not rename the file or alter its content so that our system can identify
the file.
add_trusted_domain_by_HTML_file_steps_3:
Open a new tab/window, and sign in with the host of your domain,
or connect with an FTP (File Transfer Protocol) program.
add_trusted_domain_by_HTML_file_steps_4: Upload the downloaded HTML file to the root folder of your website.
add_trusted_domain_by_HTML_file_steps_5:
Do not delete the HTML file from the root folder after verification,
as the system will periodically check for it.
add_trusted_domain_by_HTML_file_steps_6:
After completing all the previous steps, return to this page and click
the "Submit and Verify" button below.
make_sure_you_have_the_permission_to_edi:
Make sure you have the permission to edit the source code
of your website’s first page (usually homepage).
copy_the_unique_meta_tag_code_below: Copy the unique meta tag code below.
add_trusted_domain_by_META_tag_steps_3:
Open a new tab/window, and sign in with the host of the domain you
want to attach, or connect with an FTP (File Transfer Protocol) program.
add_trusted_domain_by_META_tag_steps_4:
Open your website first page/homepage index file by either using
the build-in editor (if available, e.g. in WordPress) or any other editor.
add_trusted_domain_by_META_tag_steps_5:
Paste the previously copied unique meta tag code to the
section of the first page/homepage source code and save the changes.
add_trusted_domain_by_META_tag_steps_6:
Double-check that the meta tag was successfully added to the
"head" section of the website’s first page/homepage source code.
add_trusted_domain_by_META_tag_steps_7:
After completing all the previous steps, return to this page and click
the "Submit and Verify" button below.

note_that_it_may_take_up_to_24_hours: Note that it may take up to 24 hours for the domain to be connected after the request is sent.
you_are_required_to_connect_one_of_the_s:
You are required to connect one of the supported Drive types to your training system. The files related
to your trainings will be stored on the connected Drive. Be alert that if You delete a training-related file
from the connected Drive, the file will be subsequently deleted from all places where You have used that file
in the training system.
please_connect_your_company_google_drive: Please, connect your company Google Drive or Dropbox account to upload training images.
please_connect_your_company_youtube_acco: Please, connect your company Youtube account to upload training videos.

 your drive?

google_2f_auth_info_text:
Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access
security by requiring two methods (also referred to
as factors) to verify your identity. Two factor
authentication protects against phishing, social
engineering and password brute force attacks and secures
your logins from attackers exploiting weak or stolen credentials.

Please select one of the supported types from the list.

permission_requested_agreement: I hereby give consent to Willing & Able to process my personal data for the purpose of providing an account, services and software applications and receiving e-mail communication in regards to this application. I am aware that I have the right to withdraw my consent at any time with effect for the future. I am informed that the withdrawal of consent shall not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal. I confirm that I read the Privacy Policy and the Transparency Document according to Art. 13 and 14 GDPR.

Two-factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by
requiring to verify your identity. Two-factor authentication protects against phishing, social engineering and password brute force attacks and secures your logins from attackers exploiting weak or stolen credentials.
